price: "Kuma don me, a lõkacin da ka shiga gõnarka, ka, ce, 'Abin da Allah ya so (shi ke tabbata) bãbu wani ƙarfi fãce game da Allah.' Idan ka gan ni, ni ne mafi ƙaranci daga gare ka a wajen dũkiya da ɗiya."
arabic: وَلَوۡلَآ إِذۡ دَخَلۡتَ جَنَّتَكَ قُلۡتَ مَا شَآءَ ٱللَّهُ لَا قُوَّةَ إِلَّا بِٱللَّهِۚ إِن تَرَنِ أَنَا۠ أَقَلَّ مِنكَ مَالٗا وَوَلَدٗا

version.title: Hausa language - Abu Bakr Jomy
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Hausa by Abu Bakr Mahmoud Jomy. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: walawlā idh dakhalta jannataka qul'ta mā shāa al-lahu lā quwwata illā bil-lahi in tarani anā aqalla minka mālan wawaladan
